network_connect_fail: Failed to connect to the network.
connection_reset_request: Your Learner's Block will now try to connect to the Wi-Fi network. You can connect to the same network to use your Block. If your device is not available after a minute, reconnect to your Learner's Block, check your Wi-Fi password and try again.
no_networks: No available Wi-Fi networks within range. Please ensure there is and reboot the device.
